dailys.name: Nemi forest
dailys.description: go to https://www.reddit.com/r/NemiForest/ and look at map

dailys.name: Shop runs
dailys.description: Varrock sword shop, Varrock armour shop, Varrock Staff shop, Slayer masters for boots, gems, and broad arrows, Al kharid scimitars, falador shields

dailys.name: Oo'glog red sandstone and meat
dailys.description: Mine redsandstone, crush to glass and buy meat from the shops

dailys.name: Traveling Merchant
dailys.description: Join WhirlpoolDnD friends chat to get the scout, Buy Goebi Burial Charms, Unstable air rune, Anima crystal, Slayer VIP Coupon, Distraction & Diversion reset tokens, Sacred Clay (optional), Livid plant, Gift for the Reaper, Dragonkin lamp, Dungeoneering Wildcard, Deathtouched dart (optional)

dailys.name: Player owned farms
dailys.description: Go check animals and sell for beans. Also send out trapper when available

dailys.name: Vis wax
dailys.description: Go to runecrafting guild with wicked hood

weeklys.name: Penguin hide and seek
weeklys.description: go to https://jq.world60pengs.com/ to find locations

weeklys.name: Circus
weeklys.description: location can be found on https://jq.world60pengs.com/

weeklys.name: Agoroth
weeklys.description: Can teleport directly to boss with games necklace
